mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon (coupon_code, couponName, rate, startdate, enddate, valid) VALUES (#{coupon_code}, #{couponName}, #{rate}, #{start}, #{end}, #{valid})
mapper.select: SELECT coupon_code, couponName, TO_CHAR(startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "start" ,TO_CHAR(enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "end" ,valid FROM coupon
